body.p: This site is about ,,Advanced methods of compilation and program analysis'' course taught at the CS institute at the Wroclaw University.

It will mainly outline current state of the Nemerle project, in form of news items. It's intended mainly for students attending this this course, not for general audience. Please visit our main website for more information about Nemerle project.
